biotools.summary: We present rapidGSEA – a software suite consisting of two tools for facilitating permutation-based gene set enrichment analysis(GSEA): cudaGSEA and ompGSEA. cudaGSEA is a CUDA-accelerated tool using fine-grained parallelization schemes on massively parallel architectures while ompGSEA is a coarse-grained multi-threaded tool for multi-core CPUs.

bioschemas.name: rapidGSEA
bioschemas.summary: We present rapidGSEA – a software suite consisting of two tools for facilitating permutation-based gene set enrichment analysis(GSEA): cudaGSEA and ompGSEA. cudaGSEA is a CUDA-accelerated tool using fine-grained parallelization schemes on massively parallel architectures while ompGSEA is a coarse-grained multi-threaded tool for multi-core CPUs.
